actions.text: Amendment SA 4653 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 4653 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S7475-7478; text: CR S7476) To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a classified report to Congress on the security vulnerabilities of the bridges and tunnels connecting New Jersey to New York City.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4653 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4653 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lautenberg.

purpose: To require the Secretary of Homeland Security to submit a classified report to Congress on the security vulnerabilities of the bridges and tunnels connecting New Jersey to New York City.
